question: what is the revolution period of venus in earth years
vanilla_rag_result:
The revolution period of Venus is approximately 0.615 Earth years. This is derived from its sidereal orbital period of about 224.7 Earth days. To convert days to years, you can divide the number of days by the number of days in a year (approximately 365.25):

224.7 days ÷ 365.25 days/year ≈ 0.615 years.
